```{r glioblastoma screenshot HE, eval=TRUE, include=FALSE}
if (!file.exists("./screenshots/thumbnail_glioblastoma-HE.png")) {
webshot2::webshot(
  url = "https://images.patolojiatlasi.com/glioblastoma/HE.html",
  file = "./screenshots/thumbnail_glioblastoma-HE.png"
)
}
```



```{r glioblastoma qrcode HE, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE, error=TRUE}
if (!file.exists("./qrcodes/glioblastoma-HE_qrcode.svg")) {

  qrcode_svg <- qrcode::qr_code("https://images.patolojiatlasi.com/glioblastoma/HE.html")

  qrcode::generate_svg(qrcode = qrcode_svg,
                       filename = "./qrcodes/glioblastoma-HE_qrcode.svg",
                       show = FALSE)
}
```
